tag_list: desktop-application-distribution, analytics, business-intelligence, information-technology, software-development, ios-development
overview:
Jeff leads W3i’s Information Systems Group, which includes Software Development, Business Intelligence and Information Technology teams. He is responsible for aligning the company’s technology and software systems to the company’s strategic initiatives. He is ultimately accountable for the reliability and scalability of W3i’s technology services and infrastructure as well as ensuring development processes are efficient and produce high quality results.

Jeff received a B.S in Business Computer Information Systems from St. Cloud State University in 2003. He joined W3i in 2003 as a software developer and also spent several years providing leadership to the Software Development Group as a director. Jeff is actively involved in the SCSU Computer Advisory Council, providing input toward the curriculum and educational objectives of the university’s technology programs.

relationships.title: Chief Technology Officer and Senior Vice President
